content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":129871,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にジャハルッカスを倒すとは。ﾇﾇﾇ）","translatedEnglishLine":"To think you really defeated Jaharukkas. Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129872,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さーて、テラちゃん、テラちゃん、っと」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, Tera-chan, Tera-chan, hmm."},{"lineNumber":129873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、ジャハなんとかは倒したのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, we defeated that Jahasomething."},{"lineNumber":129874,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう文句はあるまい」","translatedEnglishLine":"So you can't complain anymore."},{"lineNumber":129875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あっ、ああ、その通りじゃ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"…Ah, yeah, that's right! Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メガフォース、メガワス、","translatedEnglishLine":"Megaforce, Megawas,"},{"lineNumber":129877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂らも皆を起こし、テラ様を探すのじゃ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let us all wake up the others and search for Lady Tera! Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、それそれそれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, that's it, that's it!"},{"lineNumber":129879,"originalJapaneseLine":"手当たり次第目についた先から","translatedEnglishLine":"Randomly, starting with whatever catches his eye,"},{"lineNumber":129880,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがコールドスリープ装置を開けていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance opens the cold sleep devices one after another."},{"lineNumber":129881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、貴方はいったい……！？　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-Who on earth...!? Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ、ハズレだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn, this is a miss!"},{"lineNumber":129883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃあ、宇宙人！？　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gyaa, an alien!? Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっちの台詞だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I should be saying that!"},{"lineNumber":129885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、まだ眠いよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I'm still sleepy."},{"lineNumber":129886,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あと、五分ー……ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Five more minutes... Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー！　テラはどこだー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey! Where's Tera!?"},{"lineNumber":129888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……中々見つからないですね、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haa... We can't seem to find her, Lord Lance."},{"lineNumber":129889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそぉー……本当にいるんだろうなあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn... she's really supposed to be here, huh..."},{"lineNumber":129890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今度こそ、どりゃーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This time for sure, doryaaa!"},{"lineNumber":129891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むっ……ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129892,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ッ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...! Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、な、なんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-What is this?"},{"lineNumber":129894,"originalJapaneseLine":"今までに起こしたホルス達が","translatedEnglishLine":"The Holses who had been awakened until now"},{"lineNumber":129895,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるでランスを囲むように周囲に集まりだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"began to gather around Lance as if to surround him."},{"lineNumber":129896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだ、お前らやる気か！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-What, are you guys serious!?"},{"lineNumber":129897,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの恫喝に合わせるように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if in response to Lance's intimidation,"},{"lineNumber":129898,"originalJapaneseLine":"全てのホルスがその場に跪く。","translatedEnglishLine":"all the Holses knelt on the spot."},{"lineNumber":129899,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ？　なにしてんだ、こいつら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-What? What are they doing?"},{"lineNumber":129900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様、後ろ、後ろ見て下さい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"L-Lord Lance, behind you, please look behind..."},{"lineNumber":129901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":129902,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"...................."},{"lineNumber":129903,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには、明らかに他のホルスとは","translatedEnglishLine":"There stood, clearly different from the other Holses,"},{"lineNumber":129904,"originalJapaneseLine":"一線を画すと思われるホルスが","translatedEnglishLine":"a Holse that seemed to stand apart."},{"lineNumber":129905,"originalJapaneseLine":"厳かに立っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"She stood solemnly."},{"lineNumber":129906,"originalJapaneseLine":"メガッスは跪き、顔も上げぬまま","translatedEnglishLine":"Megass knelt without even raising his face,"},{"lineNumber":129907,"originalJapaneseLine":"主に対し挨拶を行う。","translatedEnglishLine":"and greeted his master."},{"lineNumber":129908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おはようございます。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Good morning. Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我らが女王、テラ様。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Our queen, Lady Tera. Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………おはよう。メガッス。ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Good morning, Megass. Sosososo."},{"lineNumber":129911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、な、な、な……","translatedEnglishLine":"W-W-W-W-what...?"},{"lineNumber":129912,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これが、ホルスの女王……テラ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is this the queen of the Holses... Tera...?"},{"lineNumber":129913,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そなたは？　ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"And you are? Sosososo."},{"lineNumber":129914,"originalJapaneseLine":"「またハズレではないかぁーーーっ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Another miss, isn't it!!!"},{"lineNumber":129915,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"..........."},{"lineNumber":129916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？？？」","translatedEnglishLine":"???"},{"lineNumber":129917,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルスの女王、テラは小首を傾げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Holse queen, Tera, tilted her head slightly."},{"lineNumber":129918,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"..........."},{"lineNumber":129919,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":129920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですか、妾達は人間である","translatedEnglishLine":"I see. You say we were helped by humans."},{"lineNumber":129921,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そなた達に助けられた、と。ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That you helped us. Sosososo."},{"lineNumber":129922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「御礼を述べさせて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Allow me to express my gratitude."},{"lineNumber":129923,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方はホルスの救世主です。ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You are the savior of the Holses. Sosososo."},{"lineNumber":129924,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、うむ、そーだなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, um, yeah, I guess so."},{"lineNumber":129925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様、テラ様になんだその態度は！？　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You, what is that attitude towards Lady Tera!? Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……メガフォース。ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Megaforce. Sosososo."},{"lineNumber":129927,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、出すぎた真似を致しました……！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I have overstepped my bounds...! Nunu-nu."},{"lineNumber":129928,"originalJapaneseLine":"テラは、目線だけでメガフォースを黙らせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tera silenced Megaforce with just her gaze."},{"lineNumber":129929,"originalJapaneseLine":"（くっ……こいつ、目茶苦茶いい女だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Damn... She's one hell of a woman..."},{"lineNumber":129930,"originalJapaneseLine":"　威厳もたっぷりでシッカリしていて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Full of dignity and very composed,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にジャハルッカスを倒すとは。ﾇﾇﾇ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think you really defeated Jaharukkas. Nunu-nu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、テラちゃん、テラちゃん、っと」
「おい、ジャハなんとかは倒したのだ。
もう文句はあるまい」
「……あっ、ああ、その通りじゃ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「メガフォース、メガワス、
儂らも皆を起こし、テラ様を探すのじゃ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let us all wake up the others and search for Lady Tera! Nunu-nu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、それそれそれ！」
手当たり次第目についた先から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Randomly, starting with whatever catches his eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがコールドスリープ装置を開けていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance opens the cold sleep devices one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、貴方はいったい……！？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「くそ、ハズレだ！」
「ぎゃあ、宇宙人！？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「こっちの台詞だ！」
「うーん、まだ眠いよ。
あと、五分ー……ﾇﾇﾇ」
「だー！　テラはどこだー！？」
「はあ……中々見つからないですね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haa... We can't seem to find her, Lord Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くそぉー……本当にいるんだろうなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn... she's really supposed to be here, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今度こそ、どりゃーーーーッ！」
「むっ……ﾇﾇﾇ」
「あ、な、なんだ？」
今までに起こしたホルス達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Holses who had been awakened until now

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるでランスを囲むように周囲に集まりだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: began to gather around Lance as if to surround him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ、お前らやる気か！？」
ランスの恫喝に合わせるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if in response to Lance's intimidation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てのホルスがその場に跪く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the Holses knelt on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああ？　なにしてんだ、こいつら？」
「ら、ランス様、後ろ、後ろ見て下さい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L-Lord Lance, behind you, please look behind...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？」
そこには、明らかに他のホルスとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There stood, clearly different from the other Holses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一線を画すと思われるホルスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a Holse that seemed to stand apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 厳かに立っていた。
メガッスは跪き、顔も上げぬまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megass knelt without even raising his face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主に対し挨拶を行う。
「……おはようございます。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「我らが女王、テラ様。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「…………おはよう。メガッス。ｿｿｿ」
「な、な、な、な……
これが、ホルスの女王……テラ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this the queen of the Holses... Tera...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そなたは？　ｿｿｿ」
「またハズレではないかぁーーーっ！！！！」
ホルスの女王、テラは小首を傾げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Holse queen, Tera, tilted her head slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですか、妾達は人間である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see. You say we were helped by humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そなた達に助けられた、と。ｿｿｿ」
「御礼を述べさせて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Allow me to express my gratitude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方はホルスの救世主です。ｿｿｿ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are the savior of the Holses. Sosososo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、うむ、そーだなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, um, yeah, I guess so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様、テラ様になんだその態度は！？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, what is that attitude towards Lady Tera!? Nunu-nu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……メガフォース。ｿｿｿ」
「で、出すぎた真似を致しました……！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I have overstepped my bounds...! Nunu-nu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テラは、目線だけでメガフォースを黙らせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tera silenced Megaforce with just her gaze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （くっ……こいつ、目茶苦茶いい女だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Damn... She's one hell of a woman...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 威厳もたっぷりでシッカリしていて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full of dignity and very composed,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、テラちゃん、テラちゃん、っと」
「おい、ジャハなんとかは倒したのだ。
もう文句はあるまい」
「……あっ、ああ、その通りじゃ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「メガフォース、メガワス、
儂らも皆を起こし、テラ様を探すのじゃ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let us all wake up the others and search for Lady Tera! Nunu-nu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、それそれそれ！」
手当たり次第目についた先から

「だー！　テラはどこだー！？」
「はあ……中々見つからないですね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haa... We can't seem to find her, Lord Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くそぉー……本当にいるんだろうなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn... she's really supposed to be here, huh...

「むっ……ﾇﾇﾇ」
「あ、な、なんだ？」
今までに起こしたホルス達が

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: began to gather around Lance as if to surround him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ、お前らやる気か！？」
ランスの恫喝に合わせるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if in response to Lance's intimidation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全てのホルスがその場に跪く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all the Holses knelt on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああ？　なにしてんだ、こいつら？」
「ら、ランス様、後ろ、後ろ見て下さい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L-Lord Lance, behind you, please look behind...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？」
そこには、明らかに他のホルスとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There stood, clearly different from the other Holses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一線を画すと思われるホルスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a Holse that seemed to stand apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 厳かに立っていた。
メガッスは跪き、顔も上げぬまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megass knelt without even raising his face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主に対し挨拶を行う。
「……おはようございます。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「我らが女王、テラ様。ﾇﾇﾇ」
「…………おはよう。メガッス。ｿｿｿ」
「な、な、な、な……
これが、ホルスの女王……テラ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this the queen of the Holses... Tera...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そなたは？　ｿｿｿ」
「またハズレではないかぁーーーっ！！！！」
ホルスの女王、テラは小首を傾げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Holse queen, Tera, tilted her head slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですか、妾達は人間である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see. You say we were helped by humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そなた達に助けられた、と。ｿｿｿ」
「御礼を述べさせて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Allow me to express my gratitude.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方はホルスの救世主です。ｿｿｿ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are the savior of the Holses. Sosososo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、うむ、そーだなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, um, yeah, I guess so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様、テラ様になんだその態度は！？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, what is that attitude towards Lady Tera!? Nunu-nu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……メガフォース。ｿｿｿ」
「で、出すぎた真似を致しました……！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I have overstepped my bounds...! Nunu-nu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テラは、目線だけでメガフォースを黙らせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tera silenced Megaforce with just her gaze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （くっ……こいつ、目茶苦茶いい女だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Damn... She's one hell of a woman...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 威厳もたっぷりでシッカリしていて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full of dignity and very composed,
